page.title: 12NETHERHALL SCHOOL 2
page.content: Major school events during the year are the Harvest Festival and Carol Service,Prize-Giving,the Swimming Gala and Sports Day,during which the four school houses,Crummock,Criffel,Solway and Ellen compete.The 1985 major Drama production was the musical "FIDDLER ON THE ROOF". Each weekday evening from 7 till 10 the school operates as a Further Education Centre,offering classes in 'O'Maths and English,car maintenance,woodwork and various sports.The newest addition to the school is the Youth Wing,opened in October 1984.It offers activities such as Drama,Canoeing,Photography,Video Film making and dancing to young people over 14 years.
